ClassDesc: A wrapper class for ItemAnimator that records View bounds and decides whether it should run move, change, add or remove animations. This class also replicates the original ItemAnimator API. It uses @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ItemAnimator#ItemHolderInfo_E@ to track the bounds information of the Views. If you would like to extend this class, you can override @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ItemAnimator#obtainHolderInfo_E@ method to provide your own info class that extends @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ItemAnimator#ItemHolderInfo_E@.
